title: Happy Birthday, Kasumi-chan!
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Kasumi-chan, happy birthday! 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Thanks, Kayoko! The onigiri you made for me was super duper delicious!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ehehe, that’s good. 𝅘𝅥𝅮 And, um....... Here’s your present.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Oh, thank you! Can I open it now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Of course! 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Hooray~! ......Wow, this is so cute~! This lip balm is fit for a princess!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>When I saw this lip balm at the store, I immediately thought of you. You’ll look super cute with it on!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Really!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Yeah! 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Kayoko~~!! Kasumin is gonna treasure it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
